text: (oba ekkāsu vī jīvat viya hæki obagē) bhāryayāvanva oba ovun veta hita suva læbīma piṇisa obagenma ohu nirmāṇaya kara, oba atarē ādarayada karuṇāvada æti kara tibīmada, ohugē sādhakayangen æti dæyayi. sitā vaṭahā gata hæki janatāvaṭa mehida niyata vaśayenma (ekak nova, bohomayak) sādhakayan æta
